markdownRemark.html: A brief but careful description of the controversy between Grasso and Giraldi is to be found in Bernard Weinberg, A History of Literary Criticism in the Italian Renaissance, Chicago, University of Chicago Press, 1961, pp. 177-179 and 287-289.
